member.summary:
Allows to get all extensions of Desired type.
Should mainly be used by Targets or Sources to access required extensions.
member.typeparam: In most cases, interface or abstract class that registered extensions may derive from or implement.

member.name: P:QueryNinja.Core.Extensibility.QueryNinjaExtensions.Configure
member.summary:
Allows to modify Extensions List and develop extension methods to do it in a simple way.
It is not possible to register two instances of the extension with the same Type. This type of actions will be ignored.

member.name: T:QueryNinja.Core.Extensibility.IExtensionTypeSettings`1
member.summary:

Used to configure collections of Extensions with same parent.
